pages.text: This pack features both the $(5)Double Slabs$(reset) mod and the $(5)Torch Slabs$(reset) mod.$(br2)$(5)Double Slabs$(reset) lets you place two different slabs together as one block, while also letting you place any slab vertically. There's a configurable $(5)$(l:features/features_keybinds#slabs)control$(/l)$(reset) that lets you place vertical slabs all the time.
The $(5)Torch Slabs$(reset) mod does what it says on the box, lets you place torches on top of slabs. Easy, right?
